#Part (i)


What percentage of the men in the sample report abusing alcohol employment rate? 


```{r}
 - alcohol %>%
  summarize(pct_abuse = 100 * mean(abuse), pct_emp = 100 * mean(employ)) %>%
  round(digits = 2)
```
```{r}
- alcohol %>%
  group_by(abuse) %>%
  summarize(pct_emp = mean(employ)*100) %>%
  round(digits = 2)
```
